title: Effects of metals freed by acid rain on forests

content.question: Recent studies show that the decline of some tree populations in the northeastern United States is due to a combination of factors. Which of the following is the most important factor?

choices.label: Toxic metals freed by acid deposition
Carbon dioxide produced by coal-fueled electric power plants
Carbon monoxide released in motor vehicle exhaust
Radon produced in the Earthâ€™s crust

content.answer: Toxic metals freed by acid deposition
